jade.core.persistence
Interface PersistenceSlice

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, jade.core.Service.Slice
All Known Implementing Classes:
PersistenceProxy
public interface PersistenceSlice
extends jade.core.Service.Slice

The horizontal interface for the JADE kernel-level service managing saving and retrieving agents and containers to persistent storage.

Author:
Giovanni Rimassa - FRAMeTech s.r.l.
